headline: A Psalm of Renewal
description: A compact psalm about daily newness and chosen change: life as stuttering lines, a gift within each day, and the simple switch that turns rote into renewal. It names choice, the fire in the heart, and grace—God’s power meeting our will—to rewrite the pattern.
resonantThread: Psalmic writings on endurance, light, and beginning again

motifMap.meaning: each day born anew; expectation of light
life isn’t continuous; change happens in steps
act of will that invites grace to re-pattern the day

associatedMedia.description: Symbolic triptych artwork for the post: dawn panels with paths, a sprout beneath a rising sun, and pixels turning into a flowing line—no text.
